info.title: Wilmslow Tavern
info.address: Summerfields Village, Centre, Wilmslow SK9 2HA, United Kingdom

data.text: Great pub. Love the pool table. They do a great beer promotion through the week and great music at weekends.
data.name: H G
data.responseFromOwnerText: thanks so much for your lovely review hope to see uou again very soon xx

data.name: S H
data.responseFromOwnerText: S H, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to Wilmslow Tavern!

data.text: We recently had a celebration of life at the wilmslow tavern and I must say Michelle the manager went above and beyond to accommodate our needs . The wilmslow tavern is a lovely family pub with entertainment and can accommodate private functions
data.name: Dawn OD
data.responseFromOwnerText: Dawn Od, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to Wilmslow Tavern!

data.text: Me and family were celebrating the life of my late cousin at his memorial the staff were really nice and the food was luvley
data.name: Gaynor Swindlehurst
data.responseFromOwnerText: Gaynor Swindlehurst, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to Wilmslow Tavern!

data.text: Great pub, Michelle was friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend this pub.
data.name: Adam Ward
data.responseFromOwnerText: Adam Ward, thank you so much for the positive review!

data.text: Live local don't go in too often, however things are now gonna change now, it was fabulous Michelle and Justic, (landlords I think)  we're so hospitable, atmosphere was brilliant, from now on gonna be my second home, a big thank you to all the staff at the Tavern
data.name: Phil Bradley

data.text: came from doncaster to see my mother in law, was a brilliant experience, with a really friendly environment and excellent service.
data.name: Paris-kelsey Jordan
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks so much Paris for taking the time to do a review for us here at The Tvern xx We hope to see you again next time you are here visiting wilmslow xx

data.text: Me, my partner and my child have came from doncaster to see my mum, the atmosphere was brilliant, with excellent service, with a bouncy castle to keep children entertained, will 100% be returning.
data.name: chantel keenan
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Chantell so glad you enjoyed your time with us and we hope to see you again very soon xx

data.text: if you want a warm friendly atmosphere then the tavern is the perfect place ‚ù§Ô∏èmichelle has done her utmost to bring music games and party atmosphere to what used to be quite a sad place xx well done michelle ‚ù§Ô∏è
data.name: Amanda Harrison greenhouse
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks so much Amanda xx so gladyou recognise the hard work Michelle and the team are doing her eat the Tavern and it means so much that you have taken the time to leave us a fab review X

data.text: The woman behind the bar is a top tier Karen. Certified in fact. Accidentally picked up someone else's drink at the bar by mistake and lady behind the bar decided to have ago at me and make a scene  because I "stole" the drink . A friend tried to explain to her what had happened but she was having non of it. The moment I walked in the pub she was rude and antagonising. Would only come here if you wanted a argument.
data.name: Archie Mullins
data.responseFromOwnerText: Hi Arcjie please could you contact us to discuss this matter  as soon as you can, this certainly is not how i would ecpect anyone to react to a paying customer and would like to applologise profusely. I really would like to speak in person to yourself and i am available at the pub every morning if you would please give us a ring xx

data.text: Great pub hosts couldn't do enough for us and landlord is a great DJ room to dance and great music.
data.name: Susan Rayson
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Susan for your fabulous review hope to see you here again in the future xx

data.text:
A huge thank you to the team at Wimslow Tavern, especially Michelle and Justin, for making our charity night absolutely amazing!
Michelle really went above and beyond to make our night special and Justin was superb on the microphone really pushing our raffle and auction to raise as much money as possible. The pub had a warm friendly atmosphere with a great selection of beers and spirits. It's spacious and clean and we truly were made to feel welcome. Will definitely be back
data.name: Nicholas Pollitt
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks so much for this amazing review it means the world to us here at the Tavern hope to see you again very soon xx

data.text: The owners were fantastic. They made it a really fun evening.
data.name: chevrapravata dumrong
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks so much for taking the time to give us a fab review hope to see you again very soon xx

data.text: Been here a few times now since I moved to Alderley edge , great atmosphere and served quickly and politely by all bar staff especially Michelle, love the place x
data.name: nicholas smith
data.responseFromOwnerText: thanks so much for your fabulous review hope to see you again very soon xx

data.text:
I have started to go to the Wilmslow Tavern whenever i want, I mean whenever the Mrs lets me. It's an absolutely belting pub. Friendly, welcoming, spacious, great drinks (especially the Tequila) and lots of smiling faces, creating a lovely atmosphere.  The DJ is a City fan, but I still cant help but like him.  Michelle is a fantastic hostess and they show great passion for the pub and its patrons. The effort put in by all the staff is nice to see and they deserve lots of trade.  Even the city fan. Who happens to be a bloody good DJ.
I highly recommend you pop in and try it for yourself. Don't let the ugly ginger bald bloke at the bar put you off. He is actually alright.
data.name: Robert Topping
data.responseFromOwnerText: hahaha absolutely love this review Rob and it really does mean the world to us that you have taken your time to write a review keep coming in and keep making us smile xx

data.name: Lord Addo
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks so much for taking the time to do an amazing 5 star review for us hope to see you again very soon xx

data.text:
Great atmosphere
As this is my local pub, everyone is very friendly, karaoke is such a fun night,
data.name: Hayley Weston
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Hayley so glad your enjoying the atmosphere and Justin on Karaoke cant wait to welcome you again xx

data.text:
I think the staff are exemplary and Michelle the bar manger as exceptional qualities and a very decent person along with Justin doing the DJ also karaoke weekly.

Furthermore it now child friendly with having the fencing erected and a really nice out door facilities for the open air bands and comedy nights the fund raiser events are really great spontaneous fun.

Also redecorated recently and lovely Debbie as helped the bar staff adjust to running establishment, with everybody getting to know the local community.
data.name: Charlotte Bennett
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks so much Charlotte what a fantastic review , so glad your enjoying it at The Wilmslow Tavern and the lovely staff members i will be sure to pass on your compliments xx

data.text: What a fantastic bar,,Michelle is a fantastic bar manager warm and friendly and really knowledgeable ,would recommend it to anyone üòÄ
data.name: John Hyland
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks for the great review hope to see you soon.

data.text: Great place. Michelle was on the bar  when I  when went and was really polite and professional. Would recommend paying it a visit
data.name: Karl Bleakley
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Karl fab review thanks for taking the time to mention our superstar Michelle we definitely do agree with you hope to see you again very soon xx

data.text: Been in numerous times Good atmosphere everyone‚Äôs friendly the staff are lovely the bar manager Michelle is always welcoming already knows what I want to drink before I sit down!
data.name: Katie Shipton
data.responseFromOwnerText: thanks so much Katie for your fab review means a lot to all the staff here at The Wilmslow Tavern glad you enjoy your visits xx

data.text: Amazing experience, Michelle and just were very helpful and welcoming will definitely be returning thank you very much ‚ù§Ô∏è
data.name: Melissa Yorke-davenport
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Melissa for your fab 5 star review it means so much to us here AT tHE wILMSLOW tAVERN AND HOPE TO SEE YOU AGAIN REALLY SOON XX

data.text: Had a great time in here, great pub with an amazing atmosphere, Michelle and Justin both made us all feel welcome and made the night great. We will 100% be back again. Thanks guys
data.name: Carly Kirby
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Carly for taking the time to put on such a lovely review and thanks for letting everyone know what superstars Justin and Michelle really are xx

data.text: Belting pub and great atmosphere Michelle seems to go above and beyond for her customers she creates a family like atmosphere nothing is too much for her and the dj Justin is great too even booked him for a family party after seeing him in the tavern and he was fab definitely recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è
data.name: Lucy Palm
data.responseFromOwnerText: Aw thanks Lucy this is a beautiful review and it means so much to us and also the staff xx

data.text: Lovely place and staff are so friendly Michelle was welcoming and friendly and Justin was lovely aswell 100% recommend
data.name: Amy Baker
data.responseFromOwnerText: thanks so much Amy what a lovely review these comments will definetly be passed on to Michelle and to Justin xx

data.text: Michelle is amazing and goes over and above everytime I've been. Smiley, happy, great fun. Not the same place when she isn't there. X thanks Michelle.
data.name: Tracy Atkinson
data.responseFromOwnerText: thank you so much Tracy for this fabulous review and we feel exactly the same way about Michelle she does go above and beyond and i will definitely pass on this message to her xx

data.text: Great pub with really lovely staff Jade  on the bar always has me laughing, top staff alround, the DJ‚Äôs fantastic too, (the fella lovessss the karaoke and the pool table) always made to feel welcome in this pub which is rare in Wilmslow! Great beer garden, always a good atmosphere and a smiley face!
data.name: Linda Waller
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks for your fab review Linda so glad your enjoying your time spent with us and we agree totally with you regarding Jade and I will pass on your comments to her xx

data.text:
Jade is always welcoming and fun to be around always smiling
Lots of love rosie x
data.name: Ryan Bell
data.responseFromOwnerText: I am so glad you are enjoying your visits hope to see you again very soon xx

data.text: Staff are welcoming and friendly jade in particular üòÅ
data.name: Casey Wilding
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Casey for your fab review lovely comments and so glad you are enjoying your time spent with us hope to see you again soon xx

data.text: Great pub with great atmosphere all staff very welcoming especially jade that went that extra mile for us üëç
data.name: richard parkinson
data.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks so much Richard fpor your fab review Jade is a definate asset and I will definably pass those comments on to her xx

data.text: The customer service was absolutely outstanding. I was served by a lovely young lady named Jade. I well definitely be come back.
data.name: Charlotte Rycroft
data.responseFromOwnerText: fantastic review Charlotte , thanks so much and so glad you had a fab visit and hope to see you again very soon xx

data.text: Very good pub with good entertainment. Bar staff are good too and are friendly.

data.text: Great pub management great Michelle and Justin do a fantastic job and goes the extra mile  doing the functions so everyone has a great day and night

data.text: Great pub.n atmosphere, cheap drinks. Staff are amazing with music karaoke  and such a friendly bunch of people defo be back üòÅüòÅüòÅ

data.text: Absolutely brilliant pub Michelle runs the bar efficiently and always with a beautiful smile ‚ù§Ô∏èDj Justin is honestly one of the best you can ask for any song and he will play it üé∂ the pub is buzzing with genuine down to earth people you always get a warm welcome keep up the good work

data.responseFromOwnerText: thanks so much for this fab review hope top see you again very soon xx

data.text: Amazing pub great friendly atmosphere dj Justin is great always get the pub going with is songs n karaoke all bar staff are so friendly especially  Michelle she goes above and beyond to make you feel welcome and is always smiling  highly recommend  this pub

data.text: Popped in with my husband for a drink on our way home and what a lovely pub. The staff were all friendly and nothing was to much for them. We will definitely be back again.

data.text: The pub claims to be family friendly but doesn't offer anything for families. no soft play,  no play ground,  nothing. The pub is shut  11.30 at Friday night  despite having a huge development next to it and the great location. Lack of customers should be a clear signal to the owner that changes are required.

data.text: Nice friendly pub. Shame no food

data.text: Good pub. Looks and smells clean. Quiet during week it seems handy if shopping and need a drink after. Didn't see any food being served nor menus. Plenty of screens for tv and handy beer garden.

data.text: The staff are very friendly and welcoming. The garden area is well maintained with pleasant planting and landscaping. Dogs are also made welcome. Inside is clean and comfortable. Usually food is served but was not available on my visit due to staff illness.
